Probability Mapping: - Very Low: 1 - Low: 2 - Medium: 3 - High: 4 - Very High: 5
Impact Mapping: - Very Low: 1 - Low: 2 - Medium: 3 - High: 4 - Critical: 5
Score Formula: - Risk Score = Probability × Impact - Maximum score: 25 (5×5) - Display format: Score/25
Priority Mapping: - Score ≥ 20: Critical - Score ≥ 15: High - Score ≥ 8: Medium - Score < 8: Low

Status Display: - Inline layout with "Status Saat Ini:" label - Tag with color coding (Approved: green, Rejected: red, Pending: orange) - Compact horizontal layout
Approval Buttons: - Inline with status display (right side) - Approve button (small, green, with check icon) - Reject button (small, red, with close icon) - Only visible when status is Pending
Status Notes: - Shows inline when status is Approved/Rejected - Displays approval/rejection notes - Italic text style
Compact Design: - No section title "Data Input Approval" - Minimal padding and spacing - Light gray background with border
Modal Title: - Dynamic based on action (Approve/Reject Data Input) - Icon colored based on action type
Confirmation Message: - Warning about action consequences - Color-coded background (green for approve, red for reject)
Notes Field: - Text area for approval/rejection notes - Optional for approval, required for rejection - Validation error shown for missing rejection notes
Modal Actions: - Approve/Reject button (color-coded) - Cancel button - Button styling matches action type
Pending Status: - Orange tag with "Pending" label - Shows approve/reject buttons - Instruction text for reviewing data
Approved Status: - Green tag with "Approved" label - Shows success message with checkmark - Displays approval notes if provided - Instruction text about processed status
Rejected Status: - Red tag with "Rejected" label - Shows rejection message with X mark - Displays rejection notes - Instruction text about processed status
Location: - Above all data input tabs - First section in Data Input tab - Separate from tab content
Layout: - Full-width section - Clear visual separation from tabs - Consistent with other section styling
Initial State: - Status defaults to "Pending" - Approve/Reject buttons visible - No notes displayed initially
Approve Action: - Opens approval modal with green theme - Notes optional (default empty) - On confirm: status changes to "Approved" - Shows success message - Displays provided notes if any
Reject Action: - Opens rejection modal with red theme - Notes required (validation enforced) - On confirm: status changes to "Rejected" - Shows error message - Displays rejection notes
Modal Validation: - Approve: always valid (notes optional) - Reject: requires notes before submission - Clear error messages for validation failures
State Persistence: - Approval status maintained during session - Notes preserved and displayed - Buttons hidden after decision
User Feedback: - Success message for approval - Error message for rejection - Clear visual status indicators
